thread.title: People are tweeting their depressing heart-shaped Valentine’s Day pizzas (14 Photos)
thread.title_full: People are tweeting their depressing heart-shaped Valentine’s Day pizzas (14 Photos)

author: Travis
title: People are tweeting their depressing heart-shaped Valentine’s Day pizzas (14 Photos)
text:
Twitter 
When it comes to Valentine’s Day there are two types of people: the ones who love everything about the holiday and and those who absolutely despise it and say it’s a corporate holiday used to make money. If you’re like me, you fall in the middle but I also have a girlfriend to please. 
This year, some pizza delivery chains offered heart-shaped pizzas. Your S/O doesn’t want to brave the masses on Valentine’s Day, so why not order a romantic pizza that shows how you really feel. Great idea right? WRONG! 
People immediately started tweeting photos of the horrendous “heart-shaped” pizzas they received. It’s the thought that counts right? 2
